description: Interact with with all the cute, frisky, playful little kittens you've ever wanted! Choose a cuddly virtual kitten to adopt, raise, groom and love! You'll have hours of fluffy fun choosing your kitty's breed, toys and the accessories it will wear while you play. Select your kitten from 40 different breeds. Choose from 8 kitten toys like the remote control mouse, blinky ball and laser light! 10 mini-games with 3 levels of achievement in each game. Unique kitten personalities with different breeds exhibiting different behaviors. Earn “Purrs” by keeping your kitten happy and frisky. Engaging in playful activities rewards you with unlockables and achievements. Share Meow Grams of cute and funny kitten pics with your friends.
name: Purr Pals Purrfection
disclaimer: Playable in 2D and 3D. 3D mode for ages 7+.
